AccountId.description: The unique identifier for the Bing Ads account.

CampaignId.description: The unique identifier for the campaign.

AdGroupId.description: The unique identifier for the ad group.

TimePeriod.description: The time period for the data.

CurrencyCode.description: The currency code used for the data.

AdDistribution.description: The distribution network where the ad was shown.

DeviceType.description: The type of device where the ad was shown.

Network.description: The network where the ad was shown.

DeliveredMatchType.description: The match type when ads are shown.

DeviceOS.description: The operating system of the device.

TopVsOther.description: The performance in top positions versus other positions.

BidMatchType.description: The match type of the bid.

Language.description: The language used in the ad.

AccountName.description: The name of the Bing Ads account.

CampaignType.description: The type of campaign, like search or shopping.

AdGroupName.description: The name of the ad group.

AdGroupType.description: The type of ad group, like product ads or audience ads.

Spend.description: The total spend for the specified period.

CostPerConversion.description: The cost per specified goal conversion.

QualityScore.description: The quality score of the ad.

ExpectedCtr.description: The expected click-through rate based on historical data.

AdRelevance.description: The relevance of the ad to its targeted keywords.

PhoneImpressions.description: The number of times phone number was shown.

PhoneCalls.description: The number of phone calls made as a result of the ad.

Assists.description: The number of assists for conversions.

CostPerAssist.description: The cost per assist for conversions.

CustomParameters.description: Any custom parameters associated with the ad.

FinalUrlSuffix.description: The suffix added to the final URL.

ViewThroughConversions.description: The number of view-through conversions recorded.

AllCostPerConversion.description: The cost per conversion across all conversions.

AllReturnOnAdSpend.description: The return on ad spend across all conversions.

AllConversions.description: The total number of all conversions.

AllConversionRate.description: The conversion rate across all conversions.

AllRevenue.description: The total revenue across all conversions.

AllRevenuePerConversion.description: The revenue per conversion across all conversions.

AveragePosition.description: The average position of the ad when shown.

AverageCpm.description: The average cost per thousand impressions.

Conversions.description: The total number of specified goal conversions.

ConversionRate.description: The conversion rate for a specific goal.

HistoricalQualityScore.description: The historical quality score of the ad.

HistoricalAdRelevance.description: The historical relevance of the ad.

RevenuePerConversion.description: The revenue per specified goal conversion.

RevenuePerAssist.description: The revenue per assist for conversions.
